languages.text: {n}Она немедля надевает перстень и прижимает ладонь к груди.{/n} "Я буду носить его, не снимая. Быть обласканной вашей милостью и получить особый статус среди прочих дворян протектората — бесценная награда".

traits.locale_text: {n}Она немедля надевает перстень и прижимает ладонь к груди.{/n} "Я буду носить его, не снимая. Быть обласканной вашей милостью и получить особый статус среди прочих дворян протектората — бесценная награда".

languages.text: {n}She puts on the ring without hesitation and brings her hand to her chest.{/n} "I will wear it always and never take it off. To be favoured by your grace and elevated above the other nobles in your protectorate is a priceless boon."
languages.original_text: {n}Она немедля надевает перстень и прижимает ладонь к груди.{/n} "Я буду носить его, не снимая. Быть обласканной вашей милостью и получить особый статус среди прочих дворян протектората — бесценная награда".

{n}She puts on the ring without hesitation and brings her hand to her chest.{/n} "I will wear it always and never take it off. To be favoured by your grace and elevated above the other nobles in your protectorate is a priceless boon."

languages.text: {n}Sin dudar ni por un instante, se pone el anillo y se lleva la mano al pecho.{/n} «Jamás me lo quitaré. Recibir su gracia y obtener una posición privilegiada en la nobleza de su protectorado es un don de valor incalculable».
languages.original_text: {n}She puts on the ring without hesitation and brings her hand to her chest.{/n} "I will wear it always and never take it off. To be favoured by your grace and elevated above the other nobles in your protectorate is a priceless boon."

languages.text: {n}彼女はためらうことなく指輪をはめ、胸にその手を当てる。{/n}「肌身離さず身につけ、決して外したりはしないわ。あなたの恩寵を受けて、保護領にいるどの貴族よりも高く引き立てられることは、何物にも代えがたい栄誉だわ」
languages.original_text: {n}She puts on the ring without hesitation and brings her hand to her chest.{/n} "I will wear it always and never take it off. To be favoured by your grace and elevated above the other nobles in your protectorate is a priceless boon."

languages.text: {n}她毫不犹豫地戴上戒指，将手放在胸前。{/n}“我会永远戴着这枚戒指，再也不会把它摘下来。能得到您的宠幸，在众多贵族之中享有独一无二的地位，这对我而言是无上的恩赐。”
languages.original_text: {n}She puts on the ring without hesitation and brings her hand to her chest.{/n} "I will wear it always and never take it off. To be favoured by your grace and elevated above the other nobles in your protectorate is a priceless boon."

languages.text: {n}Sie steckt sich den Ring ohne zu zögern an und legt die Hand auf ihre Brust.{/n} "Ich werde ihn immer tragen und niemals ablegen. In Eurer Gunst zu stehen und über die anderen Adeligen Eurer Entourage erhoben zu werden, ist eine unglaubliche Ehre."
languages.original_text: {n}She puts on the ring without hesitation and brings her hand to her chest.{/n} "I will wear it always and never take it off. To be favoured by your grace and elevated above the other nobles in your protectorate is a priceless boon."

languages.text: {n}Sans la moindre hésitation, elle enfile la bague sur l'un de ses doigts et porte la main à sa poitrine.{/n} « Jamais je n'enlèverai ce présent. Être dans vos bonnes grâces, et même à un rang plus élevé que les autres nobles de votre protectorat est un incommensurable honneur. »
languages.original_text: {n}She puts on the ring without hesitation and brings her hand to her chest.{/n} "I will wear it always and never take it off. To be favoured by your grace and elevated above the other nobles in your protectorate is a priceless boon."

languages.text: {n}Tereddüt bile etmeden yüzüğü takıyor ve elini göğsüne getiriyor.{/n} "Onu her daim takacağım, asla çıkarmayacağım. Sizin lütfunuzla imtiyaz sahibi olmak ve protektoranızdaki diğer soylulardan da yüksek bir mertebeye ulaşmak, paha biçilemez bir nimet."
languages.original_text: {n}She puts on the ring without hesitation and brings her hand to her chest.{/n} "I will wear it always and never take it off. To be favoured by your grace and elevated above the other nobles in your protectorate is a priceless boon."
